definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This is like a bouncer in a nightclub.
sentences.chinese: 这就像是夜总会中的保镖。

sentences.english: The nightclub has a landfill diversion rate of 89 percent.
sentences.chinese: 这家夜总会的垃圾填埋转移率达到89%。

sentences.english: A disreputable or run-down bar or nightclub.
sentences.chinese: 一种比较下贱的名声不好的夜总会或舞厅。

sentences.english: The Cigarette Smoking Guy: (No, not the Cigarette Smoking Man from The X-Files. ) Well, maybe you and your baby should go to another strip club.
sentences.chinese: 那你和你的孩子该到别的脱衣舞夜总会去了。

sentences.english: The maximum capacity at the Kiss Nightclub in Santa Maria is 1000 people.
sentences.chinese: 圣玛丽亚的亲吻夜总会最多能容纳1000人。

sentences.english: When it was time for his appointment he drifted uptown to the club entrance.
sentences.chinese: 快到约会的时间，他游游荡荡地向夜总会的大门走去。

sentences.english: Revelers pay as much as 6 pounds in a city center nightclub.
sentences.chinese: 而狂欢者在城市中心的夜总会要支付6英镑。

sentences.english: They swooped down on a night club and made 5 arrests.
sentences.chinese: 他们突然袭击了一家夜总会，抓走了五个人。

sentences.english: The night club has booked an excellent floor show.
sentences.chinese: 夜总会已安排了系列精彩文娱表演。

sentences.english: What do you say we go to the newly-opened club after work?
sentences.chinese: 下班后咱们去那家新开的夜总会玩吧？

sentences.english: A year ago, those nightclubs were packed with revelers.
sentences.chinese: 一年以前，那些夜总会总是人满为患。

sentences.english: There are quite a few of night clubs and discos around Jiuyanqiao Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 在九眼桥附近有许多夜总会和迪斯科厅。

sentences.english: Sandy tells Jeffrey about the case may be related to nightclub showgirl.
sentences.chinese: 桑迪告诉杰弗里案子可能与夜总会歌女有关。
咱们离开这个夜总会吧。

sentences.english: I did not know in which nightclub Geeta was working.
sentences.chinese: 我不清楚吉塔在哪家夜总会工作。

sentences.english: To begin with, the club itself is very unsightly.
sentences.chinese: 首先，这家夜总会本身就很不堪入目。

definition: karaoke hall/singing hall (venue for concerts of popular songs)
disco/night club/abbr. for 迪斯科廳|迪斯科厅
